about_the_game:
"Awaking Beauty" is a dual-character roguelite action game that blends science fiction with fantasy. Players take on the roles of selected high school girls piloting dream-mecha to rescue prisoners trapped in dreams. Dive into surreal dreamscapes, clear stages, and grow stronger by defeating monsters born from nightmares.

Throughout their missions, the girls will gradually bond, work together, and venture into the harsh depths of the dream world to save the trapped souls and uncover the mysteries of the dream realm.

The game supports both single-player and two-player co-op gameplay.

Flexible Character Pairing

Choose 2 characters from a roster of 4 to form a team, combining unique combat styles to create endless possibilities. In single-player mode, an AI-controlled partner will assist you in battle.

A Story of Dreams and Reality

As you traverse the dream world, uncover the characters' pasts, experiencing their sorrow, pain, and pursuit of hope. Through battles, they gradually find redemption.

Diverse Combat Styles

Equip versatile abilities using chips randomly found in stages or switch weapons to unlock significant transformations in character playstyles.

Surreal Dream World Exploration

The landscapes of the dream world reflect the collective dreams of humanity. Face adorable or terrifying nightmare creatures, each requiring unique strategies to overcome, testing your decision-making skills.
